reviewText: A very interesting view of SAVATE. It covers a lot of drills that are effective and efficient.  Truly a tribute to the French Art of Kick Boxing.

Kamel DVD on French Boxing aka Boxe Francaise or Savate in the earlier days is very well done.  The drills are well explained at various speeds.  BF requires a lot of flexibility as you are literally boxing with your feet.  Highly recommend it for any martial arts enthusiasts...
